chunks.zh: 60 岁，人生第二辆车选车建议
chunks.en: 60 years old, advice on choosing the second car in life

chunks.zh: 不好意思，有一点点标题党，最近在帮我爹看车，由于老爹原先开的是 2011 的 POLO ，换车还是想看大众的 SUV ，他自己看上了一汽大众的探歌，但是这个车马上要换代了，我就张罗看了上汽大众途观 L ，内饰外观真的老气，和 POLO 比没有质的飞跃。
chunks.en: Sorry for the slightly clickbait title. I've been helping my dad look at cars recently. Since he used to drive a 2011 POLO, he still wants to look at Volkswagen's SUVs for his next car. He himself likes the FAW-Volkswagen Tange, but this car is about to be replaced, so I arranged to look at the SAIC-Volkswagen Tiguan L. The interior and exterior are really old-fashioned, and there is no qualitative leap compared to the POLO.

chunks.zh: 同级别我还选了领克 08 、比亚迪宋 L-dmi 和唐。比亚迪内饰比较中庸，没有好看的感觉，暂时还没去试驾。试驾了领克 08 被惊艳到了，主要还是设计方面，底盘质感我觉🉐过得去。
chunks.en: In the same class, I also selected the Lynk & Co 08, BYD Song L-dmi, and Tang. The interior of BYD is relatively mediocre and doesn't have a good-looking feel. I haven't test driven it yet. I was amazed by the test drive of the Lynk & Co 08, mainly in terms of design, and I think the chassis texture is acceptable.

chunks.zh: 当然以上是我自己的试驾体验，具体还是想带他试驾个 4 到 5 辆，考虑插混、油车，不考虑纯电增程，看看大佬们有没有啥建议，或者吐槽。
chunks.en: Of course, the above is my own test drive experience. Specifically, I still want to take him to test drive 4 to 5 cars, considering plug-in hybrids and gasoline cars, but not considering pure electric range extension. See if you guys have any suggestions or complaints.

|Model| Type | Sales| Price| Remarks
| -------- | -------- |-------- |-------- |-------- |
|Tiguan L 330TSI | Gasoline Car| 26663| 17.99| 18.8 on the road
|Lynk & Co 08 E-MP| Plug-in Hybrid| 5693| 17.58| 16.5 on the road
|Audi Q3| Gasoline Car| 3225| 17.98| 25 Year Redesign
|Tang New Energy| Plug-in Hybrid| 15942| 17.98|
|Song l dmi| Plug-in Hybrid||| 13.68|

chunks.zh: 如果是列表里，我就选领克 08 E-MP
chunks.en: If it's from the list, I would choose the Lynk & Co 08 E-MP

chunks.zh: 建议让你爹一个一个试驾，然后选一个他满意的
chunks.en: Suggest you let your dad test drive them one by one, and then choose one he is satisfied with

chunks.zh: @dxddd #4 6
chunks.en: @dxddd #4 6

chunks.zh: 08 车主，不推荐 08 ，ota 反向升级，可以去懂车帝 08 的车友圈先看看评价
chunks.en: 08 owner, I don't recommend 08, the OTA is a reverse upgrade, you can go to the Dongchedi 08 car owner forum to see the reviews first

chunks.zh: 我推个会挨骂的车型，60 岁可能对品牌最看重。奔驰 GLB220 ，2.0T 版本 22 万落地吧
chunks.en: I'll recommend a model that will be scolded, 60-year-olds may value the brand the most. Mercedes-Benz GLB220, the 2.0T version should be 220,000 on the road

chunks.zh: 对于品牌无所谓的话，我推荐一手吉利星越 L
chunks.en: If you don't care about the brand, I recommend a Geely Xingyue L

chunks.zh: @x86 我自己也是，试驾之后完全不想看大众了
chunks.en: @x86 Me too, I don't want to look at Volkswagen at all after the test drive

chunks.zh: 宋 l dmi 怎么没销量
chunks.en: Why doesn't the Song l dmi have any sales?

chunks.zh: 五年之后大众 4S 都都有可能倒闭。
chunks.en: Volkswagen 4S stores may go bankrupt in five years.

chunks.zh: @ymz 后来补上去的，还没仔细研究，主要看着宋 L 销量高，比唐好看点
chunks.en: @ymz It was added later, I haven't studied it carefully yet, mainly because I saw that Song L has high sales and looks better than Tang

chunks.zh: 08 ，适合年轻人。但是你爹开，建议奥迪或者问他
chunks.en: 08, suitable for young people. But for your dad, I suggest Audi or ask him

chunks.zh: @dxddd 途观的销量一骑绝尘，但是说实在的内饰的塑料皮质的质感我觉的偏差，可能贵点的 pro 能好点。隔音很差，试驾开了极其大声的音乐，都是套路，关掉音乐之后就像开了窗一样
chunks.en: @dxddd Tiguan's sales are far ahead, but to be honest, I think the texture of the plastic leather in the interior is not good, maybe the more expensive pro version will be better. The sound insulation is very poor. I played extremely loud music during the test drive. It's all a routine. After turning off the music, it's like opening a window.

chunks.zh: 途观 L 那拖拉机质感的发动机声音真的劝退，跟老款途观感觉根本不是一个车系，整个车像是把老款用打气筒吹大的
chunks.en: The tractor-like engine sound of the Tiguan L is really dissuading. It doesn't feel like the same car series as the old Tiguan at all. The whole car is like blowing up the old model with an air pump.

chunks.zh: 我买不起，不过排版真好看
chunks.en: I can't afford it, but the layout is really nice

chunks.zh: @18k 我还是准备带他试驾一波，质感的好坏肯定能感受出来
chunks.en: @18k I'm still going to take him for a test drive, he will definitely be able to feel the quality

chunks.zh: @dddd1919 习惯新能源的顺滑，确实受不了途观的换挡
chunks.en: @dddd1919 Getting used to the smoothness of new energy vehicles, I really can't stand the Tiguan's shifting

chunks.zh: @syboml 哈哈，是这样，真实车主才会发现很多痛点，要我推荐我自己开的车，我也不推荐
chunks.en: @syboml Haha, that's right, real owners will discover a lot of pain points. If you want me to recommend the car I drive, I won't recommend it either

chunks.zh: 如果考虑 08 的话建议购买 245 或 220 续航的版本，120 版本续航在冬季不开空调和座椅加热的情况下只能跑不到 60 公里
chunks.en: If you are considering 08, it is recommended to buy the 245 or 220 range version. The 120 range version can only run less than 60 kilometers in winter without air conditioning and seat heating

chunks.zh: 买二手，这个时间点买新车，亏太多了
chunks.en: Buy a used car, buying a new car at this time will cost too much

chunks.zh: 08 16.5 就能落地了吗？这价格感觉只能买 01 啊
chunks.en: Can 08 really be on the road for 16.5? At this price, it feels like you can only buy 01
